Fun Fact headed into tonight's game:

Ryan Bowen, an assistant coach for the Denver Nuggets, holds some brief ties with the Oklahoma City Thunder.

Bowen played one game for OKC back in the 2009-2010 season.

He is one of six players to have played just one game for the Thunder.
